Title: From metrics to impact: Turn GitHub Copilot data into business value
Description:
Your GitHub Copilot deployment is live — now what? This GitHub Universe 2025 session explains how engineering leaders transform AI adoption from "nice to have" to "business critical" using GitHub’s Copilot Metrics to provide the foundation for strategic decision-making around your AI investments.

You'll discover the refreshed Copilot Metrics dashboard that delivers comprehensive usage insights you can act on today. Learn how to interpret this Copilot usage data these metrics to understand adoption patterns, identify high-performing teams, and recognize opportunities to increase Copilot utilization across your organization.

Learn real strategies for three essential business outcomes: measuring effective usage, driving broader adoption, and demonstrating tangible business value. You'll also explore practical approaches to help your teams maximize their Copilot experience and how to translate usage data into compelling ROI narratives that secure ongoing AI investment.

Speakers:

Sharanya Doddapaneni, VP, Engineering, GitHub (Speaker) Shruti Corbett, Senior Director of Engineering, GitHub (Speaker)

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 The challenge: Measuring the impact of AI 01:17 The metrics journey from adoption to business impact 02:15 Announcing the refreshed Copilot Metrics dashboard 03:02 Using metrics: How different leaders get value 06:41 Live demo: Walking through the Copilot Metrics dashboard 16:53 How metrics drive transformation at GitHub and for customers 18:40 The feedback loop: Observe, learn, and act 20:38 What's next: The roadmap for impact and SDLC metrics
